location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organisation ( PLO ) negotiators said the last two weeks of talks with Israel on implementing the long-delayed handover of most of Hebron to PLO rule had been " meaningless " , necessitating an Arafat-Netanyahu meeting .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| Hebron |
| PLO rule |
| Israel |

In this paragraph, the locations mentioned are Hebron, where the talks between PLO and Israel were taking place, and the location of PLO rule, which is not explicitly stated but can be inferred to be the area that is being handed over to PLO rule in Hebron. Israel is also mentioned as the other party involved in the negotiations.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Hebron |
| PLO rule in Hebron |

In the revised table, I have combined "PLO rule" and "in Hebron" into one location entity to reflect that it is specifically the PLO rule in Hebron that is being referred to.
